title: Personalized Storytelling Sessions
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want personalized storytelling sessions that reflect my interests and experiences so that I can engage my mind and feel connected to my passions like classical music and literacy.

title: Gentle Stretching and Mobility Guidance
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want guided gentle stretching and mobility exercises so that I can maintain my physical health and manage my joint pain effectively without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Adaptive Learning Modules – Customizable Difficulty Levels for Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want adaptive learning modules with customizable difficulty levels for activities so that I can engage in cognitive stimulation at my own pace and ability without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Hydration and Nutrition Check-ins
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to remind me to stay hydrated and eat nutritious meals so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence at home.

title: Calming Music Playlists for Relaxation
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to access calming music playlists so that I can relax and manage my stress while enjoying my passion for classical music.

title: Personalized Progress Tracking – Activity Logs for Cognitive and Physical Exercises
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to track my physical and cognitive activities so that I can stay motivated and see my progress over time.
